name: Turbid Town
description:
A scholar named Barley arrives in Turbid Town with her research team. Their goal is to locate the source of the contamination in the river. Both her allies and the locals are occasionally unhelpful.

DEMO: Contains full Good Ending storyline. No combat. 10-20 minutes. Web only.

PAID: Contains optional combat zones and Bad Ending storyline. 2-4 hours. Download only.

Suggestion: Open the Options menu and use the following settings:

  • Always Run: On
  • ME Volume: 40%
  • SE Volume 40%

Cover Image:  Salomon van Ruysdael, "River Landscape with Ferry." Public Domain.
